subject: FW: Few Tweaks on Advantage Styling

full_threads.body: @rica I have done these, can you please add 30min then ok to close. Cheers

Hey Heath,

Alban has done a content review on the website and has suggested some tweaks be made. I have forwarded his email with all the details below.

Thanks again.

Kind Regards,

Georgia Sloane
MARKETING MANAGER
0416 663 677 | georgia@advantagestyling.com.au <mailto:georgia@advantagestyling.com.au>
02 9310 1611 | Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street Banksmeadow NSW 2019
advantagestyling.com.au <http://advantagestyling.com.au/>

<https://www.instagram.com/advantagenovaristyling/> <https://www.facebook.com/AdvantageStyling>

<http://www.advantagestyling.com.au/>


From: Alban Guillemot <alban@fullsteamconsulting.com.au <mailto:alban@fullsteamconsulting.com.au>>
Date: Thursday, 3 February 2022 at 8:03 am
To: Georgia Sloane <georgia@advantagestyling.com.au <mailto:georgia@advantagestyling.com.au>>
Subject: Few Tweaks on Advantage Styling

Hi Georgia,

I hope you are well. When doing the content review, we identified a few items worth fixing on the Advantage website. Could you please ask Heath to implement the tweaks below?

- Please make the following pages no indexable by adding a noindex tag on each of these pages:

Many thanks
